channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: We paid my daughter and son-in-law’s mortgage when it reached $76K. Here’s why we chose that magic figure.
item.description: “My husband, daughter, son-in-law and I all went to the bank.”

item.title: Trump says he’ll cap credit-card interest rates at 10% as Americans battle soaring debt
item.description: Carrying credit-card debt has become increasingly expensive over the past several years, but some warn that lower interest rates could reduce credit a...

item.title: ‘It’s been a struggle getting payments from her’: I rent a house to our daughter. Do I just gift her the house?
item.description: “She would be responsible for taxes and insurance, which should be manageable.”

item.title: Trump’s plan for U.S. economic growth has a new twist — include Venezuela and Greenland
item.description: Charlie Garcia responds to readers’ concerns about oil, rare-earth minerals and America’s foreign policy.

item.title: How you could benefit from Trump’s plan for buying mortgage bonds
item.description: Borrowers with 6% and 7% mortgage rates might see a refinancing opportunity if things work out as Trump foresees.

item.title: Abel's $25 million Berkshire paycheck is in the same league as other S&P 500 CEOs

item.title: Activist Elliott shakes up leadership at Lululemon. How the firm can help reinvigorate the athleisure giant
item.description: Elliott has amassed a stake of more than $1 billion in Lululemon, and it has brought along Jane Nielsen as a potential CEO candidate.

item.title: Goldman Sachs says these stocks are too attractive to ignore in 2026
item.description: Stocks such as Dick's Sporting Goods have plenty more room to run in 2026.

item.title: Trump orders mortgage bond purchases to lower rates. These stocks are jumping in response
item.description: Analysts are now weighing the actual impact for consumers and what the move means for lending stocks.
